description: a(n) gives smallest number requiring n iterations of the map i -> A053392(i) to reach zero.
comments: 24th and 26th terms are unknown, but a(25)=9539, a(27)=4589 and a(28)=5960.
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Apr 14 2001
extensions: More terms from Berend Jan van der Zwaag, Jun 23 2001
